member.name: IVisualTreeServiceCallback.OnVisualTreeChange
member.summary: Communicates the state of the visual tree when it changes.
member.param: The association of a parent object with a child object.
The XAML element in the visual tree.
A value that indicates whether the change was an add or remove.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IVisualTreeServiceCallback
member.summary: Communicates the state of the visual tree.
